titles.title: A resolution relating to the visit of Pakistan's President Mohammad Zia-Ul-Haq to the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 5/27/1988--Introduced. Affirms the Senate's support for the security and independence of Pakistan. Welcomes Pakistan's President Mohammad Zia ul-Haq on his visit to the United States.
